metadata.title: Microsoft Office Memory Corruption Vulnerability – CVE-2016-7277 (MS16-148)
metadata.description: Microsoft Office 2016 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via a crafted document, aka "Microsoft Office Memory Corruption Vulnerability."

criteria.comment: Microsoft Office 2016 + file version

criterion.comment: Check if Mso.dll version is less than 16.0.4471.1000

metadata.title: Integer overflow in Adobe Flash Player before 13.0.0.292 and 14.x through 18.x before 18.0.0.160 - CVE-2015-3104
metadata.description: Integer overflow in Adobe Flash Player before 13.0.0.292 and 14.x through 18.x before 18.0.0.160 on Windows and OS X and before 11.2.202.466 on Linux, Adobe AIR before 18.0.0.144 on Windows and before 18.0.0.143 on OS X and Android, Adobe AIR SDK before 18.0.0.144 on Windows and before 18.0.0.143 on OS X, and Adobe AIR SDK and Compiler before 18.0.0.144 on Windows and before 18.0.0.143 on OS X allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

criteria.comment: Check for installation of vulnerable Adobe Flash Player/Adobe AIR + vulnerable file version
Adobe Flash Player is installed + version (ESR)

criterion.comment: Check if Adobe Flash Player (ESR) version is less than 13.0.0.292

criteria.comment: Adobe Flash Player is installed + version
Check for Adobe Flash Player version

criterion.comment: Check if Adobe Flash Player version is less than 18.0.0.160
Check if Adobe Flash Player version is greater than or equal 14.0.0.0

criterion.comment: Check if Pepper Flash for Google Chrome version is less than 18.0.0.160

criteria.comment: ActiveX Control is installed + Flash*.ocx version

criterion.comment: Check if Flash*.ocx (ESR) version is less than 13.0.0.292

criteria.comment: Check for file version

criterion.comment: Check if Flash*.ocx version is less than 18.0.0.160
Check if Flash*.ocx version is greater than or equal 14.0.0.0

criteria.comment: Adobe Air is installed + version

criterion.comment: Check if Adobe Air version is less than 18.0.0.144

metadata.title: Heap-based buffer overflow in Adobe Flash Player before 18.0.0.268 and 19.x and 20.x before 20.0.0.228 - CVE-2015-8446
metadata.description: Heap-based buffer overflow in Adobe Flash Player before 18.0.0.268 and 19.x and 20.x before 20.0.0.228 on Windows and OS X and before 11.2.202.554 on Linux, Adobe AIR before 20.0.0.204, Adobe AIR SDK before 20.0.0.204, and Adobe AIR SDK and Compiler before 20.0.0.204 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via an MP3 file with COMM tags that are mishandled during memory allocation, a different vulnerability than CVE-2015-8438.

criteria.comment: Check for installation of vulnerable Adobe Flash Player/Adobe AIR + vulnerable file version
Adobe Flash Player is installed + version (ESR)

metadata.title: Vulnerability in Oracle MySQL before 5.5.52, 5.6.x before 5.6.33, 5.7.x before 5.7.15, and 8.x before 8.0.1; MariaDB before 5.5.52, 10.0.x before 10.0.28, and 10.1.x before 10.1.18 – CVE-2016-6663
metadata.description: Race condition in Oracle MySQL before 5.5.52, 5.6.x before 5.6.33, 5.7.x before 5.7.15, and 8.x before 8.0.1; MariaDB before 5.5.52, 10.0.x before 10.0.28, and 10.1.x before 10.1.18; Percona Server before 5.5.51-38.2, 5.6.x before 5.6.32-78-1, and 5.7.x before 5.7.14-8; and Percona XtraDB Cluster before 5.5.41-37.0, 5.6.x before 5.6.32-25.17, and 5.7.x before 5.7.14-26.17 allows local users with certain permissions to gain privileges by leveraging use of my_copystat by REPAIR TABLE to repair a MyISAM table.

criteria.comment: Check for installation of MySQL Server/MariaDB + vulnerable version
Check for installation of MySQL Server + vulnerable version
Check for installation of MySQL Server 5.5 + vulnerable version

criterion.comment: Check if MySQL Server 5.5 version is less than 5.5.52

criterion.comment: Check if MySQL Server 5.7 version is less than 5.7.15

criteria.comment: Check for installaion of MySQL Server 8.0 + vulnerable version

criterion.comment: Check if MySQL Server 8.0 version is less than 8.0.1

criteria.comment: Check for installation of MariaDB + vulnerable version

criterion.comment: Check if MariaDB version is less than 5.5.52

criteria.comment: Check if MariaDB version is greater than or equals 10.0.0 and less than 10.0.28

criterion.comment: Check if MariaDB version is greater than or equals 10.0.0
Check if MariaDB version is less than 10.0.28

criteria.comment: Check if MariaDB version is greater than or equals 10.1.0 and less than 10.1.18

criterion.comment: Check if MariaDB version is greater than or equals 10.1.0

metadata.title: Vulnerability in Samsung Security Manager (SSM) before 1.31 (CVE-2015-3435)
metadata.description: Samsung Security Manager (SSM) before 1.31 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code by uploading a file with an HTTP (1) PUT or (2) MOVE request.

criterion.comment: Check if Samsung Security Manager is less than 1.31

metadata.title: Remove OneDrive option located in the navigation panel of File Explorer on Windows 10.
metadata.description: This method is ideal for users of Windows 10 Home, but also for Professional, Enterprise or Education, who want to get rid of OneDrive. It’s completely reversible if you ever want to use OneDrive again.

criterion.comment: Verify 'System.IsPinnedToNameSpaceTree' is set to '0'
On 64bits release, verify 'System.IsPinnedToNameSpaceTree' is set to '0'

metadata.title: Local Security Authority Subsystem Service Denial of Service Vulnerability - CVE-2017-0004 (MS17-004)
metadata.description: The Local Security Authority Subsystem Service (LSASS) in Microsoft Windows Vista SP2, Windows Server 2008 SP2 and R2 SP1, and Windows 7 SP1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (reboot) via a crafted authentication request, aka "Local Security Authority Subsystem Service Denial of Service Vulnerability."

criteria.comment: Check for installation of vulnerable Windows OS + vulnerable file version

metadata.title: Microsoft Windows Vista x64 Edition Service Pack 2 is installed
metadata.description: The operating system installed on the system is Microsoft Windows Vista x64 Edition Service Pack 2

modified.comment: Updated comment to include Vista and Server 2008
Changed registry check for amd64 to be a case insensitive equals
Changed registry check for amd64 to be case insensitive equals
Changed the tests for SP2, Vista, and windows to be case insensitive

contributor.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology

modified.comment: Added anchors and spaces to regular expression

contributor.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology

modified.comment: Updating regex to include parenthesis

contributor.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology

modified.comment: EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:obj:717 - Added an additional test for Windows Server 2003 platforms to test for the existence of the NT Directory Services
EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:obj:717 - Reverted mistaken switch of obj:717 (Service Pack) and obj:15869 (NT Directory Services)
EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:ste:3180 - new inventory for SQL Server 2008 R2 64-bit

criterion.comment: the installed operating system is part of the Microsoft Windows family
Windows Vista is installed
a version of Windows for the x64 architecture is installed
Win2K/XP/2003/Vista/2008 service pack 2 is installed
